entities.name: moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is a person who has cleared a space of desks and is giving instructions to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one being instructed by Mad-Eye Moody, feeling relaxed and unaware of his surroundings.

relationships.description: Mad-Eye Moody is instructing Harry to jump onto the desk, with Harry being obedient and preparing to spring.
Mad-Eye Moody's voice is commanding Harry to jump onto the desk, with Harry being obedient and preparing to spring.
Another voice in Harry's brain is questioning why he should jump onto the desk, with Harry being aware of this internal conflict.
